ArrayIo.h File Reference

This file offers two methods for reading in the content of arrays from an input stream and for writing this content to an output stream. More...

template<class T>

 Writes the content of array "arr" to the output stream "os".

Detailed Description

This file offers two methods for reading in the content of arrays from an input stream and for writing this content to an output stream.
